message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.  Accept and we're done, reject and we'll see how much money we both lose.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn. I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going easy on you.
Okay, I see you're not playing nice. I'll meet you halfway, but this is my final offer. Reject it and we're both gonna lose a lot more.
You're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm going to take the lead. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I've had enough of this back-and-forth. Let's split it evenly.  It's the fairest solution at this point, and we'll both walk away with something. Take it or we'll both lose everything.
